example.text: In stark contrast, [[user]]'s #DefaultOnAmerica Act does the bidding of Big Oil, increases energy costs, and sets American workers up to be left behind by abandoning our homegrown clean energy industry. Republicans are threatening our economy, our environment, and our future.
The Elberon project is expected to be completed no later than March 1. The federal funding comes from the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, which I pushed for last year.

Suspending debt ceiling talks when our country is on the brink of an economic crisis is completely irresponsible from Speaker McCarthy but not at all surprising. It just goes to show that the only people he’s listening to are the most extreme members of the Republican Party. [[url]]

He spoke about Ukraine's spirited defense against Russia's invasion, thanked Congress for our support of Ukraine's sovereignty, and recognized the need for a strong relationship between our nations. We continue to support Ukraine's war against Russian aggression to preserve democracy and freedom for all.
